author: jvanzyl
msg: o MAVEN_HOME is king, don't override MAVEN_HOME with ${maven.home}

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Everything is now stored under $MAVEN_HOME. You no longer have to
define anything in your ~/build.properties. You just have to set
$MAVEN_HOME and hopefully we can make this default to ~/maven if
people don't want to set that. That would be easy enough to add
to the scripts and if it meant that people didn't have to set
a thing to get maven running that would be great.
